title: Cass Curse ANOTHER Slap in the Face to Desperada Owners
body:
Look at that subtle earth-toned coloring, the striking tail patterns. Oh my god, the end of the tail is even different from the rest of it.
I can only be talking about Cassiopeia's Desperada skin, right?

http://i.imgur.com/m2e07w5.jpg

This is absurd. First Riot lets a kindergartner hand-paint the Desperada skin update:

http://i.imgur.com/um0xJb1.jpg

Now they have identified a hole in Cassiopeia's wardrobe for something light-brown with a cool scale pattern on the tail and decided to fill it with this:

http://i.imgur.com/YAQt3al.jpg

The craziest part is that of Cass's base skin and the other two colors in the SAME CHROMA PACK as this pseudo-Desperada skin NONE of them feature a darker tail tip to give the illusion of being a rattlesnake, only this one. It is clearly intentional.

replies.body: for me the old desparade was 10000000000x better than this ; but u know riot doesnt care about cassio players feedback

Hiya! 

First off, thanks for the feedback! We've also noticed the similarity between these two, and are discussing potential solutions.
One step ahead of you, already jumping in the thread!
:O . OP rioter i wish the balances rioter could be  like you

You might aswell consider the feedback from the other thread which is forming up to be a very big discussion: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/O2l1ItL7-cassiopeia-gets-the-short-end-of-the-stick-every-time

We feel that her chromas could offer a lot more than what you've done so far.
I like the tail on the old one better but the hat and dress on the new one better.
